name: SalonAddict
overview:
SalonAddict is an online booking platform for Hair and Beauty Salons.

Step 1 - Find the perfect Salon There are over 60,000 hair and beauty salons in the United Kingdom. In London alone there are over 6,000. Finding a salon providing the service you want, at the price you want, in an area you want is not easy. With SalonAddict.co.uk you can search and book salons in your area, online, 24 hours a day. Our salons are not afraid to show their pricing or customer reviews. Hidden extras are a thing of the past.

Step 2 - Book the service you want Previously it was impossible to compare salon prices. We show exactly what you will pay in every salon for the same service. Search for two minutes and you can save 50% on what you currently pay for a service at a salon that is closer to where you live.

Step 3 - Enjoy your appointment! At SalonAddict.co.uk our job is to make your life easier so we are registration and login free, you wonâ€™t have to create an account or remember a password. Also, on SalonAddict.co.uk you always pay the same price or less than what you would pay if you booked your appointment over the phone.
